name: Velocity Software
body:
### Fast track your plans for the web
Businesses have had to put up with slow, poorly designed WinForms applications for years. We here at Velocity believe that the modern web offers an elegant, platform-independent solution for internal applications.

### Enterprise should not mean ugly
No one should be subjected to ugly, grey forms day after day. While re-engineering your internal tools Velocity will make strides to improve the visual workflow and aesthetics of your applications.

### Changing your perception of what the web feels like
Using the lastest cutting edge web technologies Velocity can make your web applications come alive! Bluring the lines between web page and native application, we create web applications indistinguishable from a native application running on your device.

### Want to know more?
Send us an [email](#). Check out our [twitter](#).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
